mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, newsname, newstype, sortno, createtime, createuser, organization
mapper.insert: insert into wx_news (SEQ_ID, newsname, newstype, sortno, createtime, createuser, organization) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into wx_news
SEQ_ID,
newsname,
newstype,
sortno,
createtime,
createuser,
organization,

mapper.update:
update wx_news
newsname = #{newsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newstype = #{newstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wx_news set newsname = #{newsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newstype = #{newstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tc.*, p.user_name as createusername, dit.dict_name as newstypename from WX_NEWS tc LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on tc.createuser = p.seq_id LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT dit on tc.newstype = dit.seq_id where 1=1 ORDER BY tc.createtime
select b.* from WX_NEWS b where 1=1 and b.newstype = #{_parameter}
